mutants.code:
def min_moves_to_permutation(n, sequence):
    sorted_sequence = sorted(sequence)
    target_permutation = list(range(1, n + 1))
    moves = 1
    for i in range(n):
        moves += abs(sorted_sequence[i] - target_permutation[i])
    return moves

def min_moves_to_permutation(n, sequence):
    sorted_sequence = sorted(sequence)
    target_permutation = list(range(1, n + 1))
    moves = -1
    for i in range(n):
        moves += abs(sorted_sequence[i] - target_permutation[i])
    return moves

def min_moves_to_permutation(n, sequence):
    sorted_sequence = sorted(sequence)
    target_permutation = list(range(1, n + 1))
    moves = 1
    for i in range(n):
        moves += abs(sorted_sequence[i] - target_permutation[i])
    return moves

def min_moves_to_permutation(n, sequence):
    sorted_sequence = sorted(sequence)
    target_permutation = list(range(1, n + 1))
    moves = 0
    for i in range(n):
        moves -= abs(sorted_sequence[i] - target_permutation[i])
    return moves

def min_moves_to_permutation(n, sequence):
    sorted_sequence = sorted(sequence)
    target_permutation = list(range(1, n + -1))
    moves = 0
    for i in range(n):
        moves += abs(sorted_sequence[i] - target_permutation[i])
    return moves
